scenarios.name: Successful Movie Search
scenarios.description: Verify that searching for "Coolie" returns relevant movie results, including the expected movie title in the search results.

steps.description: Navigate to the BookMyShow Bengaluru homepage
Enter "Coolie" in the search bar.  (Replace '#' with the actual selector for the search input field if different)
Submit the search form. (Replace the selector with the actual selector if different)
Verify that at least one movie title containing "Coolie" (e.g., "Coolie No. 1") is displayed in the search results.  (Replace '.movie-title' with the actual selector for movie titles)

scenarios.name: Handling No Results
scenarios.description: Verify the application's behavior when searching for a movie title that does not exist.

steps.description: Navigate to the BookMyShow Bengaluru homepage
Enter a non-existent movie title in the search bar
Verify that a "No results found" message or similar indication is displayed.  (Replace '.no-results' with the actual selector for the no-results message)

scenarios.name: Partial Match Search
scenarios.description: Verify that searching with a partial movie title returns relevant results.

steps.description: Navigate to the BookMyShow Bengaluru homepage
Enter a partial movie title "Coolie" in the search bar
Verify that movies containing "Coolie" in their title are displayed in the search results
